description: Vanilla simple syrup goes a long way to round out and jazz up what would otherwise be just another nonalcoholic cocktail of citrus juice and soda Served in a Champagne glass, it’s pretty, festive and just right for making a toast, minus the booze.
title: Orchid Thief Recipe
text:
Vanilla simple syrup goes a long way to round out and jazz up what would otherwise be just another nonalcoholic cocktail of citrus juice and soda. Served in a Champagne glass, it’s pretty, festive and just right for making a toast, minus the booze.
Featured in: Don’t Call Them ‘Mocktails’.
